member.name: TOKEN_OWNER
member.summary: The TOKEN_OWNER structure contains the default owner security identifier (SID) that will be applied to newly created objects.

member.name: TOKEN_OWNER.Owner
member.summary: A pointer to a structure representing a user who will become the owner of any objects created by a process using this access token. The SID must be one of the user or group SIDs already in the token.
